column4: Uncategorized;Phnom Penh: A------  man dressed in civilian clothing took a gun and fired 6 rounds after a traffic accident in central Phnom Penh.------The incident happened at 2:10 am on Saturday
column6: 2018 in front of Sambok Khmou auto parts store on Street 93)
column7: near Psar Thmey.------Witnesses said that a car collided with the motorcycle
column8: injuring the rider.------Another man who had been sitting near the scene then fired off six gunshots (pictures only show five empties) at the car as it drove off. The gunman also fled before cops showed up.------After the incident
column9: the victim was taken to a rescue clinic.------After the incident
column10: the local police came and picked up the empty casings and took the victim’s motorbike to the station.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/385775
